events.message: I am filing a claim today for the recent car accident I was involved in on April 14th, 2024. My vehicle was hit from behind at a stop light.
The claim has been categorized as an auto accident involving rear-end collision damage on the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent named Susan Lee has been assigned to handle the claim and will be your point of contact moving forward.
We have received and acknowledged your claim regarding the vehicle collision. Our team is prioritizing your case.
Please provide photos of the damage, a police report, and a copy of your vehicle registration to proceed with the investigation.
I have submitted all requested documents including photographs of the damaged car, police report, and registration for review.
The claim investigation has begun. Our adjuster is assessing the damage and verifying the circumstances reported.
The investigation is now complete. The damage assessment confirms eligibility for a full repair coverage under your policy.
We propose a settlement offer of $4,500 to cover repairs and related expenses for your vehicle collision claim.
I appreciate the timely updates and the proposed settlement amount which seems fair to cover all necessary repairs.
Your claim has been officially approved for the proposed settlement amount without any further conditions.
The payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to your bank account as scheduled today.
Your claim has now been formally closed. Please contact us if you have any future insurance needs or questions.
The claim files and all related documents have been archived securely in our system for any future reference.
